mapper.select: select id, isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, m_titleid, m_content, m_image, m_try, m_voice, m_videos from m_articles where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into m_articles(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, m_titleid, m_content, m_image, m_try, m_voice, m_videos) values (#{isused}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{remarks}, #{mTitleid}, #{mContent}, #{mImage}, #{mTry}, #{mVoice}, #{mVideos})

insert into m_articles(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, m_titleid, m_content, m_image, m_try, m_voice, m_videos) values
(#{entity.isused}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.mTitleid}, #{entity.mContent}, #{entity.mImage}, #{entity.mTry}, #{entity.mVoice}, #{entity.mVideos})

insert into m_articles(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, m_titleid, m_content, m_image, m_try, m_voice, m_videos) values
(#{entity.isused}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.mTitleid}, #{entity.mContent}, #{entity.mImage}, #{entity.mTry}, #{entity.mVoice}, #{entity.mVideos})
on duplicate key update isUsed = values(isUsed), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), remarks = values(remarks), m_titleid = values(m_titleid), m_content = values(m_content), m_image = values(m_image), m_try = values(m_try), m_voice = values(m_voice), m_videos = values(m_videos)
mapper.update:
update m_articles
isUsed = #{isused},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remarks = #{remarks},
m_titleid = #{mTitleid},
m_content = #{mContent},
m_image = #{mImage},
m_try = #{mTry},
m_voice = #{mVoice},
m_videos = #{mVideos},
where id = #{id}
